card_text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Take 1000 damage.$NYou can only use 1 of the following effects of "Dark Contract with the Yamimakai" per turn, and only once that turn.$N●During your Main Phase: You can target 1 "D/D" Pendulum Monster in your Graveyard; place it in your Pendulum Zone.$N●During your Main Phase: You can place 1 face-up "D/D" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone.
